name: Happiness Escape
description:
I did this for the GM48 42nd 48-hour game jam! The theme was non-violence and I think I nailed that.

I didn't really have enough time to make proper artwork/animations. If I'm happy with how this is recieved; I have lots more ideas to add a proper story to it/update the graphics.

Enjoy!

https://gm48.net/game/2030/happiness-escape

Poontangular
